name: accessibility-checker
license: SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE from the 'equal-access' repository

scripts.build: npm run build:common && npm run build:ts && cd ../accessibility-checker-engine && npm install && npm run build && npm run build-debug && npm run build-node && npm run build-node-debug
scripts.build:ts: npx tsc -p tsconfig-cjs.json && sed -i'.old' 's/\/\/ const __filename/const __filename/g; s/\/\/ import { fileURLToPath }/import { fileURLToPath }/g' ./src-ts/lib/common/config/ACConfigManager.ts && npx tsc -p tsconfig.json && sed -i'.old' 's/const __filename/\/\/ const __filename/g; s/import { fileURLToPath }/\/\/ import { fileURLToPath }/g' ./src-ts/lib/common/config/ACConfigManager.ts  && rm ./src-ts/lib/common/config/ACConfigManager.ts.old
scripts.build:report: (cd ../report-react && npm run build && cd ../accessibility-checker && shx cp ../report-react/build/genReport.tsx ./src-ts/lib/common/report/genReport.ts)
scripts.build:common: shx rm -rf ./src-ts/lib/common && shx cp -R ../common/module/src ./src-ts/lib/common && npm run build:report
scripts.package:zip: shx rm -rf package && gulp --gulpfile gulp/gulpfile.mjs && shx chmod u+x package/bin/*.js && cd package && npm pack
scripts.package:npm: shx rm -rf package && gulp --gulpfile gulp/gulpfile.mjs && shx chmod u+x package/bin/*.js
